subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick beat Marco Chiudinelli, 6-1, 6-3, 7-6 (5), to move the United States into a 1-1 tie in its opening-round Davis Cup matchup with Switzerland on Friday in Birmingham, Ala. Earlier, James Blake lost, 3-6, 6-4, 6-3, 7-6 (3), to Stanislas Wawrinka. It was Roddick’s 30th Davis Cup victory, equaling Andre Agassi.
